00025 #ifndef _D3DTexture_H__
00026 #define _D3DTexture_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreD3D7Prerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreTexture.h"
00030 #include <ddraw.h>
00031 #include <d3d.h>
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00036     class D3DTexture : public Texture
00037     {
00038     public:
00039         // Constructor, called from D3DTextureManager
00040         D3DTexture(String name, LPDIRECT3DDEVICE7 lpDirect3dDevice);
00041         virtual ~D3DTexture();
00042         void load(void);
00043         void loadImage( const Image &img );
00044         void blitToTexture( const Image &src, unsigned uStartX, unsigned uStartY );        
00045         void unload(void);
00046 
00047         // D3D-specific
00048         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 getDDSurface(void);
00049     protected:
00050         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE7 mD3DDevice;
00051         LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE7 mSurface;    // Surface of the (first) device-specific texture
00052 
00053         void loadFromBMP(void);
00054         void createSurfaces(void);
00055         void releaseSurfaces(void);
00056         void copyBitmapToSurface(HBITMAP hBitmap);
00057         void copyMemoryToSurface(unsigned char* pBuffer);
00058 
00059         void generateMipMaps(void);
00060 
00061     };
00062 }
